member.name: T:Hookbase.Exceptions.AuthenticationException

member.summary: Exception thrown when there's a conflict with existing data (409).

member.summary: Exception thrown when access is forbidden (403).

member.summary: HTTP status code of the error response.

member.name: P:Hookbase.Exceptions.HookbaseApiException.RequestId
member.summary: Request ID from the response headers for debugging.

member.name: P:Hookbase.Exceptions.HookbaseApiException.Details
member.summary: Additional error details from the API response.

member.summary: Base exception for all Hookbase SDK errors.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Exceptions.NotFoundException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a resource is not found (404).

member.summary: Exception thrown when rate limit is exceeded (429).

member.name: P:Hookbase.Exceptions.RateLimitException.RetryAfter

member.summary: Exception thrown when request validation fails (400/422).

member.summary: Field-level validation errors.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Exceptions.WebhookVerificationException
member.summary: Exception thrown when webhook signature verification fails.

member.name: T:Hookbase.HookbaseClientOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Hookbase client.

member.name: P:Hookbase.HookbaseClientOptions.ApiKey
member.summary: API key for authentication (required). Should start with 'whr_'.

member.name: P:Hookbase.HookbaseClientOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: Base URL for the Hookbase API. Default: https://api.hookbase.app

member.name: P:Hookbase.HookbaseClientOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Request timeout in seconds. Default: 30 seconds

member.name: P:Hookbase.HookbaseClientOptions.MaxRetries
member.summary: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests. Default: 3

member.name: P:Hookbase.HookbaseClientOptions.HttpClient
member.summary: Optional HttpClient to use for requests. If not provided, a new HttpClient will be created.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Http.ApiClient
member.summary: HTTP client implementation with retry logic and error handling.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Http.IApiClient
member.summary: Interface for making HTTP requests to the Hookbase API.

member.name: M:Hookbase.Http.IApiClient.RequestAsync``1(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod,System.String,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Makes an HTTP request to the API and deserializes the response.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Json.BooleanConverter
member.summary: JSON converter that handles boolean values that may be represented as 0/1 integers or true/false. This is needed because the Hookbase API returns SQLite boolean fields as integers in some endpoints.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Json.NullableBooleanConverter
member.summary: JSON converter for nullable boolean values.

member.name: T:Hookbase.Json.JsonStringDictionaryConverter
member.summary: Converter for fields that D1/SQLite stores as JSON strings but should deserialize as Dictionary. Handles both actual JSON objects and JSON-encoded strings (e.g., "{\"key\":\"value\"}").

member.name: T:Hookbase.Json.JsonStringStringDictionaryConverter
member.summary: Converter for fields that D1/SQLite stores as JSON strings but should deserialize as Dictionary<string, string>.
